meanings.definition: The quality or state of being virulent.
meanings.sent1: The virulencies of the virus made it very dangerous.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the virulencies of different strains of bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The classroom erupted in laughter when the teacher joked about the virulencies of the common cold.
meanings.sent4: The virulencies of gossip can spread faster than wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the virulencies of the zombie outbreak with chilling realism.

meanings.definition: The degree of pathogenicity of a microorganism.
meanings.sent1: Doctors analyzed the virulencies of the bacteria to determine the best treatment.
meanings.sent2: Research focused on understanding the virulencies of different viruses.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character exaggerated the virulencies of the tiny germ for comedic effect.
meanings.sent4: The virulencies of the virus were compared to a silent assassin.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained the virulencies of the pathogen in a clear and concise manner.
